required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy, Immunogenicity and Safety of S. Flexneriza-S. Sonnei Bivalent Conjugate Vaccine in Volunteers Aged From 6 Months to 5 Years
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-Controlled Phase III Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy, Immunogenicity and Safety of S. Flexneriza-S. Sonnei Bivalent Conjugate Vaccine in Volunteers Aged From 6 Months to 5 Years

lead_sponsor.agency: Beijing Zhifei Lvzhu Biopharmaceutical Co., Ltd

clinical_study.source: Beijing Zhifei Lvzhu Biopharmaceutical Co., Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, immunogenicity and safety of S. Flexneriza-S. Sonnei Bivalent Conjugate Vaccine in infants and children aged from 6 months to 5 years.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy study of S. Flexneriza-S. Sonnei Bivalent Conjugate Vaccine as assessed by protective rate
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the protective rate for bacillary dysentery

arm_group.description: S. Flexneriza-S. Sonnei Bivalent Conjugate Vaccine, 0.5ml/dose, 2 doses with an interval of 30 days.
Aluminium phosphate adjuvant, 0.5ml/dose, 2 doses with an interval of 30 days.

intervention.intervention_name: S. Flexneriza-S. Sonnei Bivalent Conjugate Vaccine
intervention.description: Single intramuscular dose contains 10 µg of S. flexneri 2a polysaccharide and S. sonnei polysaccharide respectively.
Single intramuscular dose contains 0.15~0.25 mg of aluminum ion

overall_official.affiliation: Beijing Zhifei Lvzhu Biopharmaceutical Co., Ltd

facility.name: Hezhou Center for Disease Control and Prevention
Luzhai Center for Disease Control and Prevention
